title: Vaishnavi Polki Diamond Jhumka - Timeless Elegance for the Modern Bride
materials: Polki Diamonds (Uncut Diamonds) of varying sizes
Superior Clarity and Luster. Features Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced brilliance.
features: Exquisitely handcrafted Jhumka featuring a teardrop floral design embellished with Polki diamonds. The tiered design showcases traditional South Indian craftsmanship (nakshi work inspired). The pear-shaped Polki drops add a graceful movement. The setting style ensures maximum light reflection, enhancing the sparkle of the diamonds. Intricate gold filigree work provides a rich, textural contrast.
colors: Warm gold with the mesmerizing sparkle of colorless Polki diamonds. The antique finish adds depth and character to the piece.
occasions: Perfect for traditional South Indian weddings (vivaha)
and grand receptions. Also suitable for adding a touch of regal elegance to formal events.
description: Authentic South Indian design reflecting rich cultural heritage. Exceptional quality Polki diamonds sourced for their brilliance and clarity. Meticulous craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty. A statement piece that exudes timeless elegance and makes a memorable heirloom. Hyderabadi polish ensures a radiant and enduring shine.
